name: Knight Academy - Wing of Agility
description:
Hello. My name is Peter and I want to present to you my first game that I managed to create. Before playing, you should read about the controls of the game.

Controls:

Movement direction - A,D 

Jump - Space

Double jump - Space + Space

Wall jump - While on a wall, use the opposite direction and jump - Space+ A/D

Return to last respawn point - R

Its advised to play in fullscreen. 

I was working on the game when I was in the mood for it and had time. Before this, I had absolutely no experience with drawing or programming whatsoever, so please take that into consideration. I know that this game is far from perfect, but I still hope you will have some fun.

Special thanks: 

Fansame for help with text

Frosty & Quido De Ultor, who led me to the creation of this

And Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl) for his steps  sound.
